pages.text: All the dimensions in this stage:$(br2)    Abyss$(br)    Barathos$(br)    Candyland$(br)    Celeve$(br)    Creeponia$(br)    Crystevia$(br)    Deeplands$(br)    Dustopia$(br)    Gardencia$(br)    Greckon$(br)    Haven

Iromine$(br)    L'borean$(br)    Land of Lelyetia$(br)    Lunalus$(br)    Mysterium$(br)    Precasia$(br)    Runandor$(br)    Shyrelands$(br)    Vox Ponds$(br)    The Nether$(br2)    The End, Nowhere and Wither Storm Dimension is not reachable currently.

At the beginning, there are three ways to reach the other dimensions: Weeping Angels/ Nether Painting/ Falling Through.$(br2)    Weeping Angel: When you are attacked by it, you will be randomly teleported to another dimension.$(br2)    Nether Painting: Can only be placed in Overworld. You need a 2*4 wall to right-click and place it in the world.$(br)    Once you jump into it, you will be teleported to a random dimension mentioned above.$(br2)    Falling Through: Try digging through the center of the world?

For teleport steadily, you need Bonfires' things.$(br)    Use Pile of Bone and Ash and Coiled Sword to teleport between dimensions.$(br)    Every time you right-click at any block of Bonfires, you'll get a chance to teleport steadily.
